subject: Re: Thank you for your recent refinance debt request, we accepted your loan request
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your entire payment by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this deal will expire TODAY):
$476,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this user-friendly form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit score will not disqualify you!
http://siruisxkcinajobs.com/
